title: Air-stable and lithium-compatible garnet pellet enabled by surface doping for high-performance solid-state batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03199G, Paper
Sijie Guo, Ting-Ting Wu, Si-Qi Lu, Su-Ting Weng, Mu-Yao Qi, Bing Li, Yong-Gang Sun, Si-Dong Zhang, Xue-Feng Wang, Hong-Shen Zhang, An-Min Cao
Garnet-type solid-state electrolytes (SSEs), typically Li6.5La3Zr1.5Ta0.5O12 (LLZT), hold great promise for next-generation lithium metal batteries (LMBs).
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
